price: Rwose imvugo (y’ibihano) yasohoreye kuri benshi muri bo, ubwo rero ntibazemera.
arabic: لَقَدۡ حَقَّ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ عَلَىٰٓ أَكۡثَرِهِمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: laqad ḥaqqa al-qawlu ʿalā aktharihim fahum lā yu'minūna
